title: Invitation to contribute to new Collection with JoVE
content:
To date very few journals publish video articles in our field, despite this type of article being of paramount importance for sharing techniques and improving their replicability.

For this reason, I have opened a Collection with JoVE on “Current Approaches in Modeling, Design, Fabrication, and Experimentation of Phononic Crystals and Acoustic Metamaterials”: The purpose of this collection is to offer a comprehensive overview of recent advances and methodologies in Phononic Crystals and Acoustic Metamaterials.

The most recent Impact Factor for JoVE (ISSN 1940-087X) is 1.424, according to the 2021 Journal Citation Reports. JoVE articles are indexed in PubMed, Web of Science, SciFinder, EMBASE, and Scopus.

After submission, each manuscript will be peer reviewed, which is typically a 3 month process. JoVE will then generate a script and schedule a filming date. A videographer will travel to the authors’ location to film the procedure and then JoVE will take care of the editing and voiceover.

If you are interested, either message me or submit an abstract here: https://lnkd.in/eE2VyX6J

title: UK Metamaterials Network Acoustic Metamaterial conference
content:
Our research team has received a new grant to explore sustainable practices in construction using bio-based materials. This funding will support the development of next-generation materials and investigate their applications in real-world structures.

We are partnering with several academic and industrial collaborators across Europe to ensure a practical impact.

Read more on our official page.
